name: hoggishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like someone who takes too much for themselves and only thinks about themselves: Having first crack at the buffet table, he hoggishly helped himself to half of the strawberries, leaving only a few for the rest of us. The man in the audience hoggishly wasted everyone's time by asking the speaker a question that was really more of a comment. Related word
hoggish
